mapper.insert: insert into account (accountID, "name", mailbox, "password", nickname, mobilePhone, sex, avatar, individualitySignature, "identity") values (#{accountID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{mailbox,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{avatar,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{individualitySignature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identity,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.update: update account set "name" = #{name,jdbcType=CHAR}, mailbox = #{mailbox,jdbcType=CHAR}, "password" = #{password,jdbcType=CHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=CHAR}, mobilePhone = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=CHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, avatar = #{avatar,jdbcType=CHAR}, individualitySignature = #{individualitySignature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "identity" = #{identity,jdbcType=TINYINT} where accountID = #{accountID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select accountID, "name", mailbox, "password", nickname, mobilePhone, sex, avatar, individualitySignature, "identity" from account where accountID = #{accountID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select accountID, "name", mailbox, "password", nickname, mobilePhone, sex, avatar, individualitySignature, "identity" from account
